Screen refresh rate/scroll speed

Super, CONFIGURATION, ReadSingleTmInterval = 1

Determines whether the application reads all orders on the chart during screen refreshes, or just those corresponding to the current time view.

Screen refreshes are faster when the system only needs to read a subset of the order list, but scrolling is slower because any change to the time view requires the system to read a new group of orders from the database.

Values

0 = System reads all scheduled orders during screen refreshes

1 = System only reads schedules from shown interval
